solution_line_template: The new season will have {episodes_per_regular_season}+{extra_episodes_last_season}=<<{episodes_per_regular_season}+{extra_episodes_last_season}={new_season_episodes}>>{new_season_episodes} episodes
So the total number of episodes is {current_episodes}+{new_season_episodes}=<<{current_episodes}+{new_season_episodes}={total_episodes}>>{total_episodes} episodes
So it will take {total_episodes}*{episode_duration_hours}=<<{total_episodes}*{episode_duration_hours}={total_watch_time_hours}>>{total_watch_time_hours} hours to watch them all
